Postac:Tempest.NAME: Tempest
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain 1 Critical Strike, for every 7 Tempest.

Postac:Airborne.NAME: Airborne
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain additional effect when using cards with Final Blow.

Postac:TempestBlock.NAME: Eye Of The Cyclone
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain block, equal to stacks of this power, whenever you gain tempest.

Postac:DrainTheAirPower.NAME: Drain The Air
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain 1 Strength at the end of the turn, for every airborne you have.

Postac:FortifyPower.NAME: Fortify
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain 1 Dexterity, after playing
more cards.

Postac:SwiftAsTheWindPower.NAME: Swift As The Wind
DESCRIPTIONS: When you create card, create additional copy of last card created. You can create up to
cards this turn.

Postac:NextTurnPreMarkedPower.NAME: Mark Prepare
DESCRIPTIONS: Next turn the owner will take double damage.

Postac:MarkedPower.NAME: Mark
DESCRIPTIONS: The owner take double damage for
turn.

Postac:FocusOnTheWind.NAME: Focus On The Wind
DESCRIPTIONS: Every strike you play, gives you 1 Tempest.
Every strike or defend you play, gives you 1 Tempest.

Postac:FreshBreezePower.NAME: Fresh Breeze
DESCRIPTIONS: When you create a card, gain 1 energy, up to
time.

Postac:FatedPower.NAME: Fated
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you activate Flanked effect, lower cost of random card in hand by 1. Up to
times this turn.

Postac:PowerSurgePower.NAME: Power Surge
DESCRIPTIONS: Lose
Strength whenever you play Attack card.

Postac:RetainCardsForTurn.NAME: Retain
DESCRIPTIONS: Retain up to
cards in your hand.

Postac:Destruction.NAME: Destruction
DESCRIPTIONS: For every *Cut played, increase *Cut damage by 1.

Postac:DestructionPower.NAME: Destruction
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain
damage for each cut you exhaust. Your Cuts deal
more damage.

Postac:Flow.NAME: Flow
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain 1 Buffer, for every 10 Flow.
